title: Why BeReal, a Social-Media App With No Photo Filters, Is Attracting Gen Z
sub_head: Forget Instagram or TikTok. The latest social app favored by younger users is about being spontaneous without filters.
body:
At a seemingly random point every 24 hours, Kevin Lee gets a notification to post a selfie.
“Time to BeReal,” says the alert on his phone, and a two-minute countdown clock begins.
